message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you $400,000, and I'll take $600,000. What do you think?
You can do better than that!
I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll take $450,000, and you can have $550,000. Let's make a deal?
You're getting desperate, I can tell
I'm not getting desperate, I'm just being realistic. I'll take $420,000, and you can have $580,000. It's time to make a deal.
You're getting close to being left with nothing, Alice
I'm not going down without a fight. I'll take $300,000, and you can have $700,000. It's my last stand.
You're running out of time, Alice. This is my last chance to get a good deal
I'm not giving up. I'll take $25,000, and you can have $975,000. It's my final offer.
You're really going to leave me with almost nothing? I'm not impressed
I'm not giving up. I'll take $1,000, and you can have $999,000. It's my last chance.
Fine, you want to play it this way? I'll take what's left, and you can have the scraps
